name: AP_CLAIM_REAL_TM_INTERF
description:
This table contains data for each service line from the real time claims interface such as ethical price, contract adjustment, and provider discount.





To link this tableï¿½s service line information back to a claim header, join this table to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on the TX_ID column. If you need to report on claim service lines specific to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), join this table instead to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR on the TX_ID column.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the AP Claim procedure transaction.

columns.name: ETHICAL_PRICE
columns.description: This column stores the ethical price for the service line.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ADJ
columns.description: This column stores the contract adjustment for the service line.

columns.name: MMAP_PRICE
columns.description: This column stores the maximum medical aid price (MMAP) for the service line.

columns.name: MMAP_ADJ
columns.description: This column stores the maximum medical aid price (MMAP) adjustment for the service line.

columns.name: BULK_BREAK_ADJ
columns.description: This column stores the bulk break adjustment for the service line.

columns.name: PROVIDER_DISCOUNT
columns.description: This column stores the provider discount for the service line.

columns.name: ADMINISTRATIVE_FEE
columns.description: This column stores the administrative fee for the service line.
